alert.note: Alert for Bell (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 05 at 12:58PM CDT until May 05 at 2:00PM CDT by NWS Dallas-Fort Worth
info.description: The National Weather Service in Fort Worth has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Bell County in central Texas... * Until 200 PM CDT. * At 1258 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 7 miles southwest of Harker Heights, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Killeen, Temple, Copperas Cove, Harker Heights, Belton, Nolanville, Bartlett, Salado, Little River-Academy, Rogers and Holland. This includes Interstate 35 between mile markers 278 and 297. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 600 PM CDT for central Texas. For your protection get inside a sturdy structure and stay away from windows.
